Name: Tuition
About the game: Placed in an abandoned university plagued by undead, you need to be creative and resourceful to have a chance of surviving. Your goal is to escape the building, but the hordes of zombies have other plans. Everything in the environment is intractable and can be used to increase your odds of survival. Starting out with just a knife, pistol, and flashlight, you'll have to find better means of survival to make it through the night. key Features Zombies surge with increasingly challenging waves Place wooden boards in doorways to barricade zombies Use ladders, chairs, and anything you find to discover new powerful tools for survival Try to escape while you can - a church bell will ring when you can expect another wave of zombies Always keep an eye out - zombies like to trickle in
Meta Title: Tuition: May 15, 2019, Clayton Stamper and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tuition? Check out the release date (May 15, 2019), developer insights from Clayton Stamper, and a complete game summary.
